content.question: The author’s word choice in lines 14-16 (“Yet this . . . elders”) serves which of the following functions?

choices.label: It helps establish a characterization of children as playthings.
It emphasizes the pleasures of the domestic family unit.
It reveals the author’s bias towards older generations in families.
It questions the authority of parents and other relatives.

content.answer: It helps establish a characterization of children as playthings.

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
